trans-unit.source: Represents a metadata attribute for an item in the [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] metadata hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un attributo di metadati per un elemento di [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] gerarchia dei metadati.

trans-unit.source: You can access every item in the [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] metadata hierarchy as a strongly typed property bag.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere a tutti gli elementi di [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] gerarchia dei metadati come un contenitore di proprietà fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class provides properties called <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A>, and so on.
The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class also inherits a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> property, which is a collection of MetadataProperty objects.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>classe eredita anche una <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A>proprietà, che è una raccolta di oggetti MetadataProperty.</xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>

trans-unit.source: When the application creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> property automatically contains a collection of MetadataProperty objects for <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A> property, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A> property, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'applicazione crea un'istanza del <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>(classe), il <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A>proprietà automaticamente contiene una raccolta di oggetti MetadataProperty per <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A>e così via.</xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>

trans-unit.source: Gets the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo del tipo incorporato per <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"></xref> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta il tipo del tipo incorporato per <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> class that contains both the type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref> and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> </xref> classe che contiene il tipo di questo <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"> </xref> e i facet per il tipo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object that contains both the type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref> and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> </xref> oggetto che contiene il tipo di questo <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"> </xref> e i facet per il tipo.
